headline: Huntington Ingalls Tests AI Welding With Path Robotics As Shares Surge
summary: Huntington Ingalls Industries (NYSE:HII) has signed a memorandum of understanding with Path Robotics to explore integrating AI-based autonomous welding systems into its shipyards. The collaboration aims to test advanced physical AI in complex shipbuilding environments and assess how it can fit with HII’s existing technologies and workflows. The agreement focuses on potential gains in welding efficiency, quality, and workforce training across HII’s shipbuilding operations. For investors...
